[V4L2 Video Encoder]

Public Attributes

__u32 interval

Detailed Description

Holds encoder slice intrareferesh parameters.

To be used with V4L2_CID_MPEG_VIDEOENC_SLICE_INTRAREFRESH_PARAM ioctl.
